description: This file contains internal function declarations and object definitions for ASN.1 objects related to 'OtherName' and 'OtherString' types, used in ASN.1 encoding/decoding within a cryptographic or certificate context.

methods.name: AnscAsn1OtherNameCreateChildAttr
methods.description: Creates attribute object for a child element of the ASN.1 'OtherName' sequence.

methods.name: AnscAsn1OtherNameGetChildName
methods.description: Retrieves the name of a child object of the ASN.1 'OtherName' sequence by index.

methods.name: AnscAsn1OtherNameCreateChildObject
methods.description: Creates a child object for the ASN.1 'OtherName' sequence based on index.

methods.name: AnscAsn1OtherStringCreateSelection
methods.description: Creates a specific selection object within the ASN.1 'OtherString' choice based on index.

methods.name: AnscAsn1OtherStringCreateSelectionAttr
methods.description: Creates attribute object for a selection within 'OtherString' choice based on selection type.

methods.name: AnscAsn1OtherStringGetSelectionName
methods.description: Gets the name of a selection in 'OtherString' based on selection type.

methods.name: AnscAsn1OtherStringGetChoiceTagValue
methods.description: Retrieves the ASN.1 tag value of a specific choice within 'OtherString'.
